title: How to Make Pillsbury and Babybel Cheese Puffs

steps.headline: Open Pillsbury Crescent Roll package, as per instructions, and roll out dough onto a cutting board.
Separate Crescent Roll dough into triangles along perforations.
Remove plastic wrapper and wax covering from the Babybel cheese rounds.
Take a Crescent Roll dough triangle, and place a Babybel cheese round in the center of triangle.
steps.description: Fold the edges of the dough around the cheese round, and press to seal any gaps in the dough. Repeat this for as many snacks as you wish to make.

steps.headline: Grease a Pyrex baking dish or a cookie sheet.
steps.description: Arrange the snacks on the baking dish or sheet, leaving about and inch spacing between snacks.

steps.headline: Place baking dish or sheet into 375 degree oven, and set timer for 15 minutes.
steps.description: If the snacks are not brown at the end of that time, set timer for an additional 2 minutes. Repeat until the snacks are golden brown.

steps.headline: Remove snacks from oven, and transfer to a cooling rack.
Arrange on a tray and enjoy!

text: Preheat oven to 375 degrees.  Open Pillsbury Crescent Roll package, as per instructions, and roll out dough onto a cutting board.  Separate Crescent Roll dough into triangles along perforations.  Remove plastic wrapper and wax covering from the Babybel cheese rounds.  Take a Crescent Roll dough triangle, and place a Babybel cheese round in the center of triangle. Fold the edges of the dough around the cheese round, and press to seal any gaps in the dough. Repeat this for as many snacks as you wish to make. Grease a Pyrex baking dish or a cookie sheet. Arrange the snacks on the baking dish or sheet, leaving about and inch spacing between snacks. Place baking dish or sheet into 375 degree oven, and set timer for 15 minutes. If the snacks are not brown at the end of that time, set timer for an additional 2 minutes. Repeat until the snacks are golden brown. Remove snacks from oven, and transfer to a cooling rack. Allow to cool for 5 minutes. Arrange on a tray and enjoy!
